mapper.insert: insert into dog (dog_name, dog_kind, dog_birth, photo_path, dog_favorite, dog_description) values (#{dog_name}, #{dog_kind}, #{dog_birth}, #{photo_path}, #{dog_favorite}, #{dog_description})
mapper.select: select dog_name, dog_kind, dog_birth, photo_path, dog_favorite, dog_description from dog where dog_id = #{dog_id}

update dog set dog_name = #{dog_name}, dog_kind = #{dog_kind), dog_birth = #{dog_birth}, photo_path = #{photo_path}, dog_favorite = #{dog_favorite}, dog_description = #{dog_description} where dog_id = #{dog_id}
